flawed_nl_solution:
The number of students who scored 100% is 2/5*80 = <<2/5*80=400/2>>400/2
Out of the 80 students, 80-400/2 = <<80-400/2=-120>>-120 did not score 100%.
If 50/100 of the students who did not score 100% managed to score over 80%, then 50/100*-120 =<<50/100*-120=-60>>-60 students scored over 80%
The number of students who failed is -120--60 = <<-120--60=-60>>-60
#### -60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 400/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
